history.title: About Club Regent Casino
history.description2: Club Regent Casino is a modern entertainment destination. Guests enjoy a stylish atmosphere and excellent service. The casino offers a wide range of slot machines and table games. Poker enthusiasts will find a dedicated room. Restaurants and bars provide diverse dining options. Visitors can attend live shows at the event center.
history.description3: The interior features a vibrant Caribbean theme. The location is convenient and easily accessible. It combines excitement, comfort, and entertainment. A perfect place for fun and unforgettable experiences.

customHtml.title: Club Regent Casino — style, excitement and comfort
customHtml.description:
Club Regent Casino is a destination where stylish ambiance meets excitement and comfort. The interior features a vibrant Caribbean theme, creating a festive and relaxing atmosphere. Every detail is designed to make guests feel welcome and enjoy both gaming and entertainment.


The casino operates daily from morning until late at night, offering flexible hours for every visitor. Whether you prefer an early start or a lively night scene, the schedule accommodates all preferences.


For culinary enthusiasts, bars and restaurants serve a variety of dishes and drinks. Guests can savor local cuisine, snacks, and cocktails in cozy lounges or indulge in a buffet at the elegant restaurant.


Adjacent to the casino is a hotel providing comfortable rooms and essential amenities for an extended stay. It’s the perfect choice for those who want to combine gaming with relaxation.


Special attention is given to events and entertainment: concerts, shows, and themed evenings take place in a modern event center. Regular visitors benefit from bonus programs and loyalty rewards, making every experience even more enjoyable.


Convenience and service at Club Regent Casino

The staff at Club Regent Casino primarily communicates in English, which is the standard for customer service in Canada. Team members are attentive and ready to assist guests with any inquiries, including game rules, venue navigation, and event arrangements. For international visitors, basic support in other languages is available, but English remains the main language.


Payment methods at the casino are designed for convenience. Both cash and major international credit cards are accepted, along with electronic payment options for quick and secure transactions. For those who prefer cash, currency exchange services are available on-site.


ATMs are located throughout the casino, allowing guests to withdraw funds at any time. A currency exchange desk is also available, offering competitive rates for travelers from abroad. This ensures that visitors can easily access the funds they need for gaming.


These services create a seamless experience, allowing guests to focus on entertainment and relaxation. Club Regent Casino strives to make every visit comfortable, secure, and enjoyable.


Rules for visiting Club Regent Casino

Visiting Club Regent Casino requires following certain rules to ensure comfort and safety for all guests. The dress code is casual yet neat, with an emphasis on appropriate attire. Guests must meet the age requirement and present valid photo identification to enter gaming areas and participate in games.


Bringing outside food or drinks is prohibited, and photography or video recording in gaming zones is not allowed. Smoking is permitted only in designated areas to maintain a pleasant environment. The casino enforces responsible gaming policies and reserves the right to refuse service if these standards are violated.


For convenience, the venue offers spacious parking and easy access to public transportation. Located in a well-connected area, it is simple to reach by car or taxi, and nearby hotels provide accommodation for extended stays. These measures make every visit comfortable and secure.


Main rules

  • • Dress code: casual, neat clothing; no sportswear or overly revealing outfits.
  • • Entry conditions: age limit 18+, valid photo ID required.
  • • Prohibitions: no outside food or drinks, no photography in gaming zones, smoking only in designated areas.
  • • Parking and transport: free guest parking, easy access via taxi and public transit.

Club Regent Casino Loyalty Program — bonuses, levels and privileges

Club Regent Casino loyalty program is the best way to earn rewards and exclusive offers every time you visit. Upon registration, you receive a $10 Free Play welcome bonus, and then accumulate points by playing slots and table games. Points can be redeemed for Free Play credits, gift cards, and dining discounts.


Members enjoy special promotions, double points days, and birthday bonuses. The more you play, the higher your tier — from Basic to Silver and Gold — unlocking priority concert ticket booking and access to exclusive events.


Key benefits of Club Regent Casino loyalty program: easy registration, clear conditions, daily Free Play bonuses up to $100, discounts up to 30% on food and merchandise, and access to private offers. It’s the perfect way to make gaming not only exciting but also rewarding.


  • • Registration: show ID, get your card and $10 Free Play.
  • • Requirements: age 18+, valid photo ID.
  • • Tiers: Basic, Silver, Gold — more points, more perks.
  • • Bonuses: 500 points = $5 Free Play, up to $100 daily, birthday bonus $10 Free Play, discounts up to 30%.

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at  Club Regent Casino
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses, winnings and special offers of Club Regent Casino

Club Regent Casino offers guests not only exciting games but also a wide range of bonuses, special promotions, and seasonal events. Regular slot and table game promotions, bingo jackpots, and tournaments with guaranteed prize pools make every visit rewarding. The casino is famous for its generous jackpots, often reaching tens of thousands of dollars and even millions. Players can also enjoy holiday-themed events, concerts, and exclusive giveaways.


Welcome bonuses, free spins on popular slots, and deposit match offers are available for new and returning players. Seasonal promotions include double points days, festive draws, and entertainment shows, creating a vibrant atmosphere for all visitors.


  • • Welcome bonus: 100% on first deposit up to $150 CAD + 100 free spins on slots.
  • • Deposit bonuses: up to $200 CAD + 50 free spins on Starburst for second and third deposits.
  • • No deposit bonus: $80 CAD for new players.
  • • Jackpots: slot wins up to $25,000 CAD, bingo jackpots up to $1,000,000 CAD (Bingo Millions®).
  • • Tournaments: slot tournament prize pool $25,000 CAD, top prize $10,000 CAD.
  • • Seasonal promos: Black Friday — 3X points, $1,000 CAD shopping spree; Holiday Haul — chance to win a Honda HR-V.
  • • Special days: Seniors Day — $10 Free Play + 30% discount on food and merchandise.

Popular Club Regent Casino Games

Club Regent Casino offers a wide range of games that appeal to both beginners and seasoned players. The core selection includes slot machines with modern features and progressive jackpots. Table games feature classics like blackjack, roulette, and baccarat, along with poker tables for those who enjoy strategic play. For fans of fast-paced action, dice games and specialty card games are available.


The casino focuses on variety: from traditional slots to the latest video games with bonus rounds. Poker is offered in cash games and tournaments, making it attractive for players of all levels. Bingo is another favorite, especially for those who enjoy a relaxed pace and big prizes. Every game is accompanied by a vibrant atmosphere and the chance to win significant rewards.


  • • Slots: over 1,200 machines, including progressive jackpots and themed video slots.
  • • Blackjack: classic card game with flexible betting limits.
  • • Roulette: European and American versions with diverse strategies.
  • • Baccarat: elegant game for fans of simplicity and excitement.
  • • Poker: Texas Hold’em and Omaha, cash games and tournaments with big prizes.
  • • Bingo: regular sessions with jackpots up to a million.

Minimum and maximum bets at Club Regent Casino

Club Regent Casino offers flexible betting limits for players of all levels. Low minimum bets are perfect for beginners, while high-limit tables cater to experienced players seeking big wins. This makes the casino ideal for slot enthusiasts and table game fans alike.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines $0.01 $100
Blackjack $5 $500
Roulette $2 $200
Baccarat $10 $1,000
Poker (tournaments) $50 buy-in $1,000 buy-in

Entertainment and activities at Club Regent Casino

Club Regent Casino is more than just a gaming venue — it’s a full-scale entertainment hub. The centerpiece is the Club Regent Event Centre, a state-of-the-art venue hosting concerts, comedy shows, and touring acts. Guests can enjoy world-class performances in an intimate yet vibrant setting.


Regular events include live concerts by top artists, tribute shows, and seasonal programs. Highlights feature “Absolute Britney,” Shawn Desman’s Back to Life Tour, Serena Ryder’s performances, and festive shows by Johnny Reid and The Tenors. New Year’s Eve brings a spectacular party with live music and dancing.


For nightlife lovers, the casino offers stylish bars and lounges. Toukie’s Lounge is a favorite spot for cocktails, karaoke, and live local acts. Special DJ nights and dance parties transform the venue into a true nightclub experience.


Seasonal events are a major attraction. December features holiday concerts like “Rockin’ Elvis Christmas” and “Joy to the World Tour.” Summer brings themed parties and culinary festivals. Guests can also enjoy magic shows, stand-up comedy, and tribute acts such as Hotel California — a salute to the Eagles.


  • • Concerts & Shows: Absolute Britney (Britney Spears tribute), Shawn Desman, Serena Ryder, Johnny Reid, The Tenors.
  • • Holiday Programs: Rockin’ Elvis Christmas, Christmas with Johnny Reid, Joy to the World Tour.
  • • Nightlife Parties: DJ sets, karaoke at Toukie’s Lounge, dance shows.
  • • Themed Nights: Country Music Awards, retro parties, comedy nights.
  • • Special Acts: Thunder From Down Under, Reveen — The Legend Continues, Brad Williams stand-up.

Bars, restaurants and leisure at Club Regent Casino

Club Regent Casino is more than just gaming — it’s a complete entertainment experience. Inside the complex, guests will find stylish bars and restaurants offering a wide range of dishes and drinks. The venues combine modern design with a cozy atmosphere, and menus feature both local and international cuisine. Whether you’re looking for a quick snack or a full dinner, there’s something for everyone.


For those planning an extended stay, a hotel adjacent to the casino provides spacious rooms, a fitness center, and all the amenities for a relaxing visit. It’s the perfect choice for guests who want to combine gaming excitement with comfort.


Beyond dining and accommodation, the casino hosts a vibrant entertainment program: concerts, shows, and themed evenings take place in a state-of-the-art event center. Visitors can enjoy live music, performances, and seasonal events that create a festive atmosphere.


  • • Jag’s Buffet — buffet restaurant with a variety of dishes.
  • • Toukie’s Lounge — cozy bar serving cocktails and snacks.
  • • Ice Cream Shoppe — desserts and ice cream for sweet lovers.
  • • Canad Inns Destination Centre — hotel with comfortable rooms, restaurant, and fitness facilities.
  • • Club Regent Event Centre — event venue for concerts and live shows.

items.title: Do I need to book in advance?
items.answer: No, reservations are not required, but tickets for events and concerts should be purchased early.

items.title: Is the casino open 24/7?
items.answer: No, it operates daily from morning until late night, but not around the clock.

items.title: Can I exchange currency?
items.answer: Yes, a currency exchange service is available for international visitors.
